content: ready to make a blanket with delicious texture the combination of raised and recessed areas form a blanket that s as cozy as it is visually striking the resulting blanket is a true showstopper - perfect for adding a modern warmth to any space in this pattern we ll practice the waffle stitch a technique that uses post stitches to create a grid-like effect but what truly sets the waffle stitch apart is its irresistibly squishy texture snuggling in this blanket feels like being wrapped in an insulating cloud measurements 38 x 42 5 instructions are provided for modifying the pattern to create a smaller baby blanket or larger throw yarn you ll need about 2 750 yards 1150 grams of a worsted weight yarn such as lion brand wool-ease or similar ad-free pdf is formated for easy printing or mobile viewing downloading - this listing is for the woolly waffles throw crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our favorite crochet chunky blanket patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/crochet-throw-blanket-patterns/chunky-crochet-blankets/
